text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Injunctive relief" means:
a permanent injunction;
a temporary injunction; or
a temporary restraining order.

"Person participating or interested in a labor dispute" means a person against whom relief is sought if the person:
is engaged in the industry, craft, trade, or occupation in which the dispute occurs; or
is an agent, member, or officer of an association of employees or employers engaged in the industry, craft, trade, or occupation in which the dispute occurs.
